attributes.action: Stop the spare bedroom tax please it will mean poverty and stress for vulnerable children- STOP IT PLEASE
attributes.additional_details: it is simply unfair that visiting children or young people cannot visit their ill parents or unable to find work parents- what about the ones who have made it to university with no help??? its assumed they find a job? really? this is a ridiculous law i have never felt so passionate about taking action as now. Deplorable on those who chose it.
